channel.title: Index Policy on Qian Jia (贾骞)
channel.description: Recent content in Index Policy on Qian Jia (贾骞)

item.title: Enabling Ultra-Fast Online Order Fulfillment: Efficient Inventory Management for Micro-Fulfillment Centers
item.description: In this paper, we propose an effective threshold-based policy to help retailers make well-informed decisions, by formulating the MFC inventory decision problem as a Markov decision process.
